scripts.update: git submodule foreach git pull origin main && npm run update-dev
scripts.update-dev: cd hydra-dev && git pull origin dev && cd ../
scripts.build: cp -a deploy/. dist/ && cp -r hydra-garden/dist/ dist/garden && cp -r hydra-functions/docs/ dist/api && cp -r hydra-functions/docs/ dist/functions && cp -r hydra-docs/ dist/docs-old && cp -r hydra-docs-v2/public/ dist/docs && cp -r hydra-grants/public dist/grants && cp -a hydra/public/. dist/ && cp -a hydra-dev/dist dist/dev
scripts.deploy-all: npm run update && npm run build && git add . && git commit -am 'updated build' && npm run publish
